definitions.example: I don't like him, and I don't like her either.

definitions.definition: One or other of two people or things.
definitions.example: He made me two offers, but I did not accept either.

definitions.definition: Both, each of two or more.
Introduces the first of two (or occasionally more) options or possibilities, the second (or last) of which is introduced by “or”.
definitions.example: Either you eat your dinner or you go to your room.
